name: Star Primitive Floorcloth
description: This is a primtive style floorcloth that can be made in any size.  They can be used as runners on tables or beautiful artwork for your floors.  The size that I am selling here is the 3x2 burgandy star design with a mustard background.  They are made from  a heavy 22 oz. or #6 weight canvas and are heavier then most floorcloths around, they are excellent quaility!  The floorcloth starts out with 4 base coats and then the stencil is applied and finished off with 3 coats of "Poly Satin" finish, which is guaranteed to last for years to come!  These have are very low maintenance to take care of and are wonderful for people who have pets, children, or allergies.  All you have to do to clean these is wipe them down or just mop over them just as you would any floor.  Any other questions feel free to ask!

name: Stratton Tavern, Historical Floorcloth
description:
This ia a 2x3 size floorcloth, other sizes are available per request and payment.  Made from 22oz. canvas, heaviest in the business!  This is a replicated historical floorcloth from the 1800's.   This floorcloth is absolutely beautiful as is or colors can be changed to meet your preference.
This particular floorcloth has a burgandy red border with a thin inset black border surrounding the black diamonds with a beige background.

name: "One Shoe Off", John Brewster Jr.
description:
This is a 4x4 size floorcloth, but is available in other sizes per request.  Made from 22 oz. canvas, heaviest in the business!  This is an original replica by John Brewster Jr. "One Shoe Off" from 1807.  This floorcloth is absolutely beautiful and will add a great accent to any flat surfaced flooring!
This particular floorcloth is a black border surrounding the red and black hand-cut stencil design with a mustard yellow background.  Gorgeous!!!

name: Red Daisy Diamond Floorcloth
description:
This particular floorcloth is a 5x7 size and other sizes are available per request and payment.  It is made from 22 oz. canvas, heaviest in the business!
There is a burgandy red border with a black bar on both ends, red diamonds, and light black daisy flowers.  Colors can be changed if these do not meet your preference, just ask!
